page.title: 12INDUSTRY-GOTHAM INDUSTRIES
page.content: In Gotham there are three main industries other than farming.There is the South Nottinghamshire Bus Company.British Gypsum mines gypsum, which is taken by lorry to the East Leake works where it is crushed into powdered plaster and packed into sacks. The plaster is transported by lorry to all over Britain.Joywully is a knitting factory,where jumpers, cardigans and tracksuits are made.It is very noisy in the knitting factory with the clattering machines.We did a survey to see how many children had parents who worked at any of the above industries. Total Joywully Knitting Factory 3 South Notts Bus Company 7 British Gypsum Plaster Works 24
